question: Which song by Troye Sivan became his first to enter the top 40 of the Billboard Hot 100 chart?

content: Question: Which song by Troye Sivan became his first to enter the top 40 of the Billboard Hot 100 chart?

<python>
# Search for Troye Sivan songs and related entries
results = search_pages("Troye Sivan songs")[:10]

# Look for songs that mention entering the Billboard Hot 100 top 40
for result in results:
    title = result['title']
    content = read_section(result['page_id'] + ":full")
    
    # Look for keywords related to Billboard Hot 100 or top 40
    if 'Billboard' in content or 'top 40' in content or 'Hot 100' in content:
        if 'first' in content and 'Billboard' in content:
            print(f"=== {title} ===")
            print(content)
            break
</python>

**Troye Sivan Mellet** ( ; born 5 June 1995) is an Australian singer-songwriter, actor and former [YouTuber](YouTuber). As a YouTube personality, Sivan uploaded [blog](video)(video blog)s regularly and, as of 2021, has over 7.3million subscribers and over 1.3billion total views. After gaining popularity as a singer on YouTube and in Australian talent competitions, Sivan signed with [Australia](EMI)(Universal Music Australia) in 2013 and released his third extended play, *[TRXYE](TRXYE)* (2014), which peaked at number five on the US [200](*Billboard*)(Billboard 200). Its lead single, "[Little Pill](Happy)(Happy Little Pill)", reached number ten on Australian music charts. In 2015, he released his fourth extended play, *[Wild](Wild (Troye Sivan EP))*, followed by his debut studio album, *[Neighbourhood](Blue)(Blue Neighbourhood).* The album's lead single, "[Youth](Youth (Troye Sivan song))", became Sivan's first single to enter the top 40 of the [Hot 100](*Billboard*)(Billboard Hot 100) chart, peaking at number 23.

His second studio album, *[Bloom](Bloom (Troye Sivan album))* (2018), reached number three in Australia and number four on the *Billboard* 200 chart. Its lead single, "[My My!](My)(My My My! (Troye Sivan song))", became Sivan's second number-one single on the *[Billboard](Billboard (magazine))* [Club Songs](Dance)(Dance Club Songs) chart. In 2020, his EP *[a Dream](In)(In a Dream (EP))* was released.

As an actor, Sivan portrayed the younger [Wolverine](Logan (film series character)) in *[Origins: Wolverine](X-Men)(X-Men Origins: Wolverine)* (2009) and starre
